title: HAIR BRACELET (Pack of 4) Thin Black & Clear Hair Coils 4.5cm - Sleek, Minimalist, Strong-hold, Perfect firm hold for all hair types | EASY REMOVAL, NO HAIR DENTS, KINKS, OR CREASES
features: WEAR COMFORTABLY ON YOUR WRIST: Tired of hair elastics strangling your wrist, leaving a mark and causing discomfort to a point that you end up taking it off and… losing it? Hair Bracelet is the solution for you. Our innovative hair accessory is larger than your traditional invis…bble hair elastic, yet sleeker and thinner. You can expect to wear it around your wrist so comfortably that you don’t remember it’s there!

MINIMALIST FASHION PIECE: Hair Bracelet can be recognized by its signature classic thin 5cm diameter ring. It compliments any jewelry or watches you also wear on your wrist and acts as an extra piece of smart fashion

ADJUST GRIP STRENGTH: The brilliant larger design of Hair Bracelet allows you to double loop or triple loop around your hair bun/ponytail to provide a custom hold tightness. Perfect for everyday normal activity to the most rigorous sports, you can rely on Hair Bracelet to keep your hair in place
NO KINKS, NO CREASE, NO HAIR DAMAGE: You can have a peace of mind when removing your hair elastic from dry or wet hair.

YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Hair Bracelet understands how much time and money is put into maintaining your hair. Our product is here to give you the best solution available on the market and if you’re not happy with our product, we’ll make it right 100%. Drop us a message and we’ll get back to you within a couple hours. If you’re happy about it, share with the world and tell us how we did!
description: Tired of hair elastics that looks larger in the photo than in real life?  Tired of hair elastics that are too small and stretches out too quickly?  Tired of hair elastics that doesn’t hold up your hair like it is supposed to?  Tired of hair elastics that fits too tight around your wrist, causing discomfort?  Tired of hair elastics that show up great in photos but arrives with a completely different shade of color?  Hair Bracelet is your answer.  Hair Bracelet is a minimalist styled fashion piece to keep your hair in place throughout your everyday activity. When not in use, it serves as a perfect fashionable bracelet that comfortably fits snug around your wrist. The simplistic thin design is light to wear, not in the way and very user-friendly.  One of the main reason for the 4.5cm diameter size of the Hair Bracelet because we understand that a comfortable stylish bracelet will encourage you to keep on your wrist, directly resulting in lower chances of misplacing the infamous situation, “Where’s my hair tie?”  The second reason for a 4.5cm diameter hair elastic is to enable you to adjust the hair ring’s grip firmness by either looping it twice or three times around your hair. You can confidently rely on Hair Bracelet whether you have thick, thin, curly, or straight hair. This hair elastic is an all-in-one solution for any type of hair types and styles, including pony tails, hair buns, and pig tails.  The larger diameter design also prevents the extreme over tension that causes the hair elastics to wear out.  The material is made of certified medical plastic with no latex, meaning that you can be confident to use on your hair or on your skin. Safe to use for your daughter’s ponytail or your husband’s man bun, the simplistic design makes this Hair Bracelet unisex.
